mapper.insert: insert into truck (t_id , t_name , t_food , t_comment , t_open, t_close, t_local, t_address, t_member) values (#{tId},#{tName},#{tFood},#{tComment},#{tOpen},#{tClose},#{tLocal},#{tAddress},#{tMember})
mapper.select: select * from truck where t_address like concat('%',#{tAddress},'%')
mapper.update: update truck set t_avg = (select round(avg(r_score), 1) from review where r_truck=#{tId}) where t_id=#{tId}
update truck set t_local=#{tLocal} where t_id=#{tId}
